vulnerabilities: Information Exposure Through an Error Message
description: The function is vulnerable to several issues. First, it does not validate the input 'data' which can lead to unexpected behavior (CWE-20). Second, it exposes potentially sensitive server information (CWE-200). Third, it may expose sensitive error information (CWE-209). Lastly, it does not control the size of the response, which can lead to resource exhaustion (CWE-400).
